availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Murray (Anderson County, Kentucky, farm picker. )

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farm picker. Native of Ireland. Son of William Murray and Esther Dooly Murray. Married to Ann Murray. Father of Jane Murray, John Murray, Mary Murray, Bee Murray, Thomas Murray, Margerite Murray. Farm picker in Anderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 453-454.
_ Ireland, Catholic Parish Registers, 1655-1915_ National Library of Ireland; Dublin, Ireland; Microfilm Number: Microfilm 04175 / 01, p. 33.
